page.title: 11TIMOTHY'S SCHOOL DAY.
page.content: I am 11 years old. I live in Marchington near Uttoxeter. On Monday I get out from under my duvet at 7.30am. I don't want to but Mum comes up and pulls me out. I get on my school uniform which is navy blue. Then I go for a wash. Mum calls me for breakfast. I have some cornflakes,then I walk to the bus stop. We reach school at 8.55. When Mrs Smith comes we have the register. Our first lesson is class studies. We do words ending in"tion", then we learn about churches in medieval times. At break we play 40-40, then have Humanities on farming. At dinner we play 40-40,then I have my sandwiches .Next we have Maths with Mrs Smith.After break is French then Music. At 3.45 the bell goes to go home I have chips,sausages,and baked beans,then I play cricket with my friends.In the
